title: Simulation-Based Peer-Assisted Radiographic Imaging Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Provision of a virtual simulation environment to compensate for constraints in actual clinical practice due to radiation safety regulations

learning_goals: Perform radiographic imaging procedures (patient positioning, equipment setup, image quality verification) with 80% accuracy in simulation environments
Can provide structured feedback in three or more stages to peers on radiographic imaging techniques
Can apply radiation safety protocols (dose adjustment, use of protective equipment) with 100% compliance in virtual patient scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
